about_the_game:
Puppet: Hide And Seek - is a 7 vs 1 multiplayer horror game where one player takes on the role of a brutal Killer and seven other players are Survivors trying to escape from the killer.

THE GAME HAS 2 MODES.


1. Hide And Seek - is a multiplayer horror game in (7 vs 1) mode,
where one player takes on the role of a brutal Killer, and seven other players are Survivors trying to escape the killer.

2. Survival - you can play alone or with friends, where you have to look for objects and confront your grandmother.

CAN YOU BE SAVED??


  • Multi-user features
Take advantage of our in-game positional voice chat. Invite friends or find other players using the server browser.

  • hide and seek
Hide in closets, walls, bushes, houses, but remember the main thing is your life is at stake.

  • Teleports
Find hidden places and discover new places where you can hide.

  • Killer
The Killer sees where you are talking, so you need to talk as little as possible.

  • Magic
Grandma will find various sophisticated magical ways to kill you.

  • Items
Pick up keys, bits, open locked doors and destroy the killer while there is a chance.


The goal of the Survivors in each game is to try not to get caught by the Killer and escape from the scene of the murders - it sounds easier than it really is.
